text: Michele Ann Marie Fabares (born January 19, 1944), better known through the stage name Shelley Fabares, is an American movie and television actress and pop singer. Her acting career started around 1947 at age three. She played Mary in The Donna Reed Show. She played Christine Armstrong in the ABC sitcom Coach. Fabares was born in Santa Monica, California. She was married to Lou Adler from 1964 until they divorced in 1980. In 1984, she married Mike Farrell. Her aunt was actress Nanette Fabray. ==References== Category:Actors from Santa Monica, California Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:American pop singers Category:Democrats (United States) Category:Singers from California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Shelley Fabares
